mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT (REP_NO, mem_ID, REP_CODE, REP_BCODE, REP_BNO, REP_REID) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(REP_NO),0) + 1 FROM REPORT),#{id},#{code},#{bcode},#{bno}, #{repid})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM REPORT WHERE REP_isDeleted = 'N'
SELECT REP_no AS NO, MEM_id AS ID, REP_code AS CODE, REP_bcode AS BCODE, REP_bno AS BNO, REP_reid AS REPID, REP_cDate AS WDATE FROM REPORT WHERE REP_isDeleted= 'N' ORDER BY REP_no ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET mem_block = 'F' WHERE mem_id= #{repid}
